sen.j: 1613年、幕府は、寺院・僧侶の圧迫および朝廷と宗教界の関係相対化を図って、「勅許紫衣竝に山城大徳寺妙心寺等諸寺入院の法度」（「勅許紫衣法度」「大徳寺妙心寺等諸寺入院法度」）を定め、さらにその2年後には禁中並公家諸法度を定めて、朝廷がみだりに紫衣や上人号を授けることを禁じた。
sen.e: In 1613, the bakufu aimed to oppress the temples and monks and balance the relationship between the Imperial Court and the religious groups and decreed "Chokkyo(imperial sanction) Shie tome and Yamashiro Daitoku-ji Temple Myoshin-ji Temple to Shoji Nyuin Hatto"("Chokkyo Shie Hatto" "Daitoku-ji Temple Myoshin-ji Temple to Shoji Nyuin Hatto") and established the Kinchu Narabani Kuge Shohatto(Various Regulations for the Imperial Court and Court Nobles) 2 years later and prohibited the Imperial Court from easily presenting Shie and Shonin names.
